project.title: Understanding Triangles
project.description: Explore different types of triangles (Equilateral, Isosceles, Scalene) and learn how to calculate their area.

project.title: Mastering Fractions
project.description: Learn how to add, subtract, multiply, and divide fractions with interactive examples.

project.title: Exploring Geometry Shapes
project.description: Understand the properties of geometric shapes like squares, circles, and polygons.

project.title: Angle Exploration
project.description: Learn about acute, obtuse, and right angles, and how to measure them using a protractor.

project.title: Mastering Measurement Units
project.description: Understand various units of measurement (length, weight, volume) and how to convert them.
